resources.string: If you withdraw consent to the access and use of non-personal data from your device, Wallpaper Carousel services will be deactivated and any collected data will be deleted within the period specified in applicable laws and regulations.

string.name: carousel_cookies_content
string.Data: When you tap images and stories in Wallpaper Carousel, their full versions will be opened in your browser. Our trusted third party content provider can then recommend additional content and ads that are tailored to your interests. If you agree to activate this feature, they will place cookies in your browser, as described in this Cookie Policy. If you decline cookies, Wallpaper Carousel will still work but its content and recommendations might stop being relevant to you. You can always change your preferences in Settings.

resources.string: Cookies allow us to personalize your Lock screen experience.

string.name: carousel_privacy
string.Data: "Read and agree to our trusted third party service provider's Privacy Policy and User Agreement before using Wallpaper Carousel."

resources.string: Wallpaper Carousel will show you fresh stories every time you unlock your device

"In order to provide you with better services, processes running on your device (including SystemHelper, RegService, and Carrier Services) may periodically send the information related to your device and SIM card (including IMEI, IMSI, MSISDN, MEID, ICCID, MAC address, MIUI version, Android version, device model, and basic hardware specifications), as well as approximate location information (including region, coordinates, area identifier, and base station ID) to the carrier via Wi-Fi, mobile data network, or free SMS. The carrier promises to analyze relevant information only to improve the quality of services or to provide customized services or technologies, and won't disclose relevant information to third parties in any form that identifies you personally. The specific carrier statement shall prevail. Consult your carrier regarding the cost of using this service."

string.name: check_box_label
string.Data: "By turning on this feature, you're agreeing to <a href=%1$s>Xiaomi Interconnectivity Services Privacy Policy</a >."

resources.string: You can use this app to view time, as well as use timer, world clock, stopwatch, set alarms, and more.
You can choose turn off location access in Settings > Privacy protection > Manage or restrict permissions for individual apps in Security.

"In order to improve the services provided to you, the mobile network operator of your choice may upload your personal data and the info about this device to its servers using Wi-Fi networks or mobile data connection. This information will only be used for statistical purposes in order to improve the quality of the services and provide more personalized content. This information won't be used to identify you personally and won't be disclosed to third parties."
You can use this app for navigation, as well as viewing coordinates, atmospheric pressure, and altitude.
Swipe up to enter the system
Content Center aggregates content and services from multiple channels. Here you can read articles, watch videos, view daily featured items, and receive content recommendations.
Keep holding down two fingers to enable accessibility.

"When you tap the images and stories in Wallpaper Carousel, we'll open their full versions in your browser. Taboola, our trusted third party content provider, can then recommend additional content and ads that are tailored to your interests. If you agree to activate this feature, Taboola will place cookies on your device via the browser, as described in Taboola's Cookie Policy. If you decline the use of cookies, Wallpaper Carousel items will continue to appear on your Lock screen and full stories will be opened in your browser, but additional recommendations won't be specifically selected for you. You can change your preferences anytime in the Settings."
"Decide whether you'd like our trusted third party content providers to use cookies to personalize content recommendations and ads based on your interests."

Downloads is an app provided by Xunlei used for downloads and managing downloaded content (including App store content, videos, system updates, themes, and browser content) for users of Xiaomi devices.

You turned on TalkBack by pressing the screen with 2 fingers for more than 10 seconds. TalkBack provides voice feedback for people with visual impairments. If you turned it on by accident, tap the Cancel button, and then double tap the screen.
Quick apps service framework is a basic service framework that supports quick apps distribution and operation.
Mi Link uses MIUI Bluetooth capabilities to let you quickly connect to nearby Bluetooth devices.
Mi Services Framework allows you to use Mi Account, Mi Push, Analytics, and MIUI BI.

To provide you with these services, Mi Services Framework (Mi Account, Mi Push, Analytics, MIUI BI) needs to connect to the internet, access your location, phone number, IMEI, and IMSI, and allow your device to receive push notifications
Games plug-in allows you to sign in, create orders, complete payments, use coupons, and participate in promotion events.

To be able to work normally, Google Play needs to connect to the internet, access your location, be able to send SMS and MMS, record audio, make calls, access calendar events, call history, sensors, storage, camera, device info, and accounts.
No network connection. View the Privacy Policy for this keyboard at %s.
IMS service provides basic communication capabilities and is used for high-definition audio and video calls.
"Choose the default keyboard that you'll use for writing messages, notes, and just about everything else. Note that you can install other third-party keyboards later."
Xiaomi Internet Communication Services lets you discover, connect, and communicate with other Xiaomi devices.

"Xiaomi Interconnectivity Services allow your devices to interact with each other wirelessly. These services include Mi Smart Hub, Mi Smart Play, MIUI+ Beta, Mi Share, and casting. To be able to work normally, these service need to connect to the internet and require the following permissions: \u0009\u0009Mi Smart Hub: \u0009\u0009Turn Wi-Fi on and off \u0009\u0009For transferring items over Wi-Fi \u0009\u0009Record audio \u0009\u0009For transferring audio playback to connected devices during casting or screen mirroring \u0009\u0009Access storage \u0009\u0009For transferring and receiving files wirelessly \u0009\u0009Mi Share: \u0009\u0009Access and save files and photos on your device \u0009\u0009For transferring and receiving files wirelessly \u0009\u0009Access location \u0009\u0009For transferring items to nearby devices over Wi-Fi and Bluetooth \u0009\u0009Turn Bluetooth on and off \u0009\u0009For finding devices nearby \u0009\u0009Turn Wi-Fi on and off \u0009\u0009For finding devices nearby and transferring files wirelessly \u0009\u0009Connect to nearby devices \u0009\u0009For finding devices nearby and connecting to them \u0009\u0009Casting: \u0009\u0009Turn Bluetooth on and off \u0009\u0009For finding devices nearby \u0009\u0009Turn Wi-Fi on and off \u0009\u0009For finding devices nearby \u0009\u0009Access location \u0009\u0009For getting the info about nearby devices \u0009\u0009Record audio \u0009\u0009For transferring audio playback to connected during casting If you don't agree to grant such permissions, you won't be able to use Xiaomi Interconnectivity Services. Features are subject to change. Some of the features above may not be available on all device models or for all system versions. Refer to the MIUI website (www.miui.com) to check compatibility."
"If your device goes missing, you won't be able to prevent other people from using it and accessing your data unless you set a screen lock. Skip anyway?"
Sharing location information with emergency rescue agencies

In accordance with the law, mobile carriers can obtain the location information of mobile devices to comply with the requirements of emergency rescue agencies (fire departments and the police) which pursue security and emergency rescue purposes.
Location services provides a variety of location-based services based on your location information.
Location services use positioning for providing location-specific services. When location services are used by your device, QCC module will connect to the network to speed up the positioning process.
Emergency rescue agencies can obtain your current location upon request

MIUI Daemon is used to improve system stability and performance. To be able to work normally, this service needs permissions to access and save items to device storage.

"Help improve your MIUI device experience by automatically sending diagnostic, device, and app usage data to Xiaomi. This will help improve battery life, MIUI system and app stability, and more. The data you'll send will contain general information about your device and how you use it (e.g. battery level, system and app activity, and errors). The data will be used to improve MIUI devices. Turning off this feature doesn't affect your device's ability to send the information needed for essential services such as system updates and security. You can control this feature from Settings > Passwords & security > Privacy > Usage and diagnostics."
Help improve your MIUI device experience by automatically sending diagnostic, device, and app usage data to Xiaomi. This will help improve battery life, MIUI system and app stability, and more.
Help us improve our products and services by sharing your usage stats with us.
MIUI Daemon allows you to transfer data from your device when its screen is damaged.
For allowing quick apps to access the calendar;

For accessing and saving backups on your device

For allowing your other compatible devices that you connect to this device to access call history. This will only happen when you proactively require using call history via another device. Call history and contacts shared by the system via Bluetooth will only be cached locally on your devices and shared with them with your permission.
For accessing call history in order to display blocked items
For accessing phone status, recording calls, and pausing recordings during incoming calls
For allowing your other compatible devices that you connect to this device to access contacts. This will only happen when you turn Bluetooth on or edit your contacts while Bluetooth is on.

(Including POCO Launcher Privacy Policy and User Agreement)

"Wallpaper Carousel recommendations are powered by Taboola, our trusted third party content provider. To provide this content, Taboola needs to access and store non-personal data from your device, including your system language and browser type. You can learn how Taboola uses the collected data in Taboola's Privacy Policy and User Agreement. Read and agree to the terms and conditions provided in these documents before you continue. If you don't agree, Wallpaper Carousel services will be deactivated."
Privacy protection is the commitment behind the design of our products

We are committed to respecting and protecting your privacy. Prioritizing research and development in the field of information security, Xiaomi constantly works on improving the methods, practices, and technical solutions that safeguard your data. We also share our latest achievements with our partners in order to ensure your privacy across the board.
We shall protect your personal information in accordance with the relevant laws, regulations, and privacy policies.

In accordance with Android %2$d standards, a one-time permission will be withdrawn within a set period of time (around %3$s) after the corresponding app stops running. If you open the app during this short period of time, the permission will be withdrawn then.

resources.string: The SIM card activation service verifies the information of the currently inserted SIM card to make sure that MIUI services can work normally. These services include Find device, Mi Message, creating Mi Accounts using phone numbers, and syncing messages and call history.
"Couldn't find SIM card. Make sure SIM card is properly installed and you have sufficient funds on your balance."
Allow connecting to mobile data networks? If you do, the SIM card you insert will be used to connect to mobile data networks.
To insert your SIM card, read the instructions that came with your device.
"Insert a SIM card before you continue. Find device and sync-related functionality won't be fully available to you if you create an account without a SIM card. This device supports eSIM. "
"SIM card couldn't connect to the network"
"Your SIM card couldn't connect to a valid carrier network. Make sure you have sufficient funds on your balance and try to connect again."
